content.title: Mukhyamantri Asangathit Karmakar Cycle Sahayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Mukhyamantri Asangathit Karmakaar Saayakal Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 28 April 2012. Under this scheme, One cycle will be provided free of cost to each women beneficiary. The main objective of the scheme to empower the unorganized female worker through provide them free cycle.
benefits: A free of cost cycle will be provided.
eligibility: Applicant must be an unorganized female worker.
Applicant registered in any district of the Chhattisgarh state.
Applicant must be between the ages of 18 and 40.
Applicant must not be receiving benefits under any other parallel scheme of the State Government for the same purpose.
exclusions: Applicant must not have received a sewing machine under the Sewing Machine Assistance Scheme implemented by the Board or any other government scheme.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Mukhyamantri Asangathit Karmakaar Saayakal Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 28 April 2012.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower the unorganized female worker through provide them free cycle.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: A free of cost cycle will be provided.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All registered female unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be between the ages of 18 and 40.

faqs.question: Is an applicant who has received a sewing machine under the Sewing Machine Assistance Scheme eligible for benefits under this scheme?
What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
